name: medical-forms-template-generator
description: Sistema Generador de Plantillas para Formularios MÃ©dicos de Aseguradoras Mexicanas

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:production: npm run type-check && npm run code-quality && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend:fix && npm run lint:backend:fix
scripts.code-quality: npm run format:check && npm run lint
scripts.code-quality:fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.audit: npm audit && npm run audit:frontend && npm run audit:backend
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix && cd frontend && npm audit fix && cd ../backend && npm audit fix
scripts.security:scan: npm run audit && npm run deps:check
scripts.deps:check: npm outdated --depth=0 && cd frontend && npm outdated --depth=0 && cd ../backend && npm outdated --depth=0
scripts.deps:update: npm update && cd frontend && npm update && cd ../backend && npm update
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules frontend/build backend/dist
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.precommit: npm run code-quality && npm run type-check
scripts.prepush: npm run test && npm run build
